akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1131(67), 60 Stat. 1040

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 24. Repealed. Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1131(67), 60 Stat. 1040
Section, act May 3, 1945, ch. 105, § 12, 59 Stat. 105, related to restriction on transaction of business by officers and employees.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective three months after Aug. 13, 1946, see act Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title XI, § 1141, 60 Stat. 1040.
